about_the_game:
Concept

Tired of your job? Me too! But what if you told your boss to go to hell? What could happen?

F*ck This Job is the perfect game to let out all your work stress! Arm yourself with a variety of office supplies – your best weapons in this epic battle.

Turn rulers into close combat tools, use staplers as ranged attack weapons, and discover many other creative weapons. Face off against colleagues, bosses, managers, and even the CEOs of your company.

Your goal? Escape alive from this infernal company!

Enemies

Your colleagues become your enemies when they fire you, managers are the strongest common enemies you can encounter during your journey. Various bosses will be encountered along the way, but be careful, like every boss, dealing with them won't be easy.

Gameplay

Power of Coffee
Use it to leverage objects on the map to your advantage, throw cups, bottles, chairs at your enemies.

Office Weapons
In the office, anything can become a weapon. Use staplers, pencils, CDs as ranged weapons, or rulers, mice as melee weapons. These are some examples of the weapons that can be found during your gameplay.

Movement
Use fast movement to escape or attack your enemies, jump between platforms to reach your objectives, use your feet and hands as combat weapons.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features violent combat with stylized, non-realistic blood and intense hand-to-hand fights. Throughout the narrative, there are explicit references to suicide at certain points, involving characters in situations of extreme desperation or sacrifice. These themes are part of the story and may be sensitive for some players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Core i5 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent DX11 GPU
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Core i7 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent DX11 GPU

short_description: Tired of work? In F*ck This Job, release your pent-up stress! Use office supplies as weapons and face off against colleagues, bosses, and managers. Your goal is simple: escape this hellish company alive!
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
